pref.name: fastSpeed
pref.label: Fast Speed
pref.hint: seconds between characters being typed for fast mode.

pref.name: fastSoundInterval
pref.label: Fast Sound Interval
pref.hint: number of milliseconds between playback of the fast sound (0 makes the sound play when a character is typed.)

pref.name: zoomSpeed
pref.label: Zoom Speed
pref.hint: seconds between characters being typed for zoom mode.

pref.name: zoomSoundInterval
pref.label: Zoom Sound Interval
pref.hint: number of milliseconds between playback of the zoom sound (0 makes the sound play when a character is typed.)

pref.name: skippableDefault
pref.label: Skippable Default
pref.hint: whether these buttons have any effect by default.
